tell application "System Events" to set quitApps to name of every application process whose background only is false

input: close all safari tabs except current
output:
tell application "Safari"
	tell window 1
		set currentIdx to index of current tab
		repeat with i from (count of tabs) to 1 by -1
			if i is not currentIdx then close tab i
		end repeat
	end tell
end tell

tell application "Finder"
	set fileList to every file of folder "Desktop" of home
	set output to ""
	repeat with f in fileList
		set output to output & name of f & " - " & modification date of f & return
	end repeat
	return output
end tell
